name: Throwingfire.GitHub.io
tagline: The home of a small group of developers
body:
### Welcome to Throwing Fire 
Throwing Fire is a small indie developer group who like working together to make games that keep people entertained also giving them the freedom to do what ever the genre specifies.


### Our Pledge
We are here to ensure that all people of the gaming world can have fun playing our games making sure that if our game is free we mean it's free.Ever hate it when a game is free to play but then in order to progress you have to pay Â£40.00 to continue not with Throwing Fire.Alough some of our games in the future may cost we will always keep free to play games FREE.

### Social Media 
([Twitter](http://twitter.com/Throwing_Fire)).
([Facebook](http://www.facebook.com/pages/Throwing-Fire-Productions/779102652138623?fref=ts)).

### The Team
Alpha - Owner/Founder/Part time coder 

Ranty - Concept Artist/Support

Chase - Modeler (3D)

David - Coder 

Jack - Coder 

Othman - Modeler (3D) 

timo - Coder 

William(Bill) - Server & Networking
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
